Verses: 1 en Magane, Nee Un Seviyai Gnaanaththirku Saaiththu, Un Irudhayaththai Buththikku Amaiyappannumporuttu,
2 nee En Vaarththaigalai Etrukkondu, En Kattalaigalai Unnidaththil Baththirappaduththi,
3 gnaanaththai Vaa Endru Kooppittu, Buththiyai Saththamittu Azhaiththu,
4 adhai Velliyaippol Naadi, Pudhaiyalgalaith Thedugiradhupol Theduvaayaagil,
5 appozhudhu Karththarukku Bayappadudhal Innadhendru Nee Unarndhu, Dhevanai Ariyum Arivaik Kandadaivaai.
6 karththar Gnaanaththaith Tharugiraar; Avar Vaayinindru Arivum Buththiyum Varum.
7 avar Needhimaangalukkendru Meygngnaanaththai Vaiththuvaiththirukkiraar; Uththamamaai Nadakkiravargalukku Avar Kedagamaayirukkiraar.
8 avar Niyaayaththin Nerigalaith Tharkaaththu, Thammudaiya Parisuththavaangalin Paadhaiyaik Kaappaatrugiraar.
9 appozhudhu Needhiyaiyum, Niyaayaththaiyum, Nidhaanaththaiyum, Sagala Nalvazhigalaiyum Arindhukolluvaai.
10 gnaanam Un Irudhayaththil Pravesiththu, Arivu Un Aaththumaavukku Inbamaayirukkumbodhu,
11 nalyosanai Unnaik Kaappaatrum, Buththi Unnaip Paadhukaakkum.
12 adhinaal Nee Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vazhikkum, Maarupaadu Pesugira Manushanukkum,
13 andhagaara Vazhigalil Nadakka Needhinerigalai Vittu,
14 theemaiseyya Magizhndhu, Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Maarupaadugalil Kalikoorugiravargalukkum,
15 maarupaadaana Paadhaigalilum Konalaana Vazhigalilum Nadakkiravargalukkum Nee Thappuvikkappaduvaai.
16 than Ilavayadhin Naayaganai Vittu, Than Dhevanudaiya Udanpadikkaiyai Marandhu,
17 ichchagamaana Vaarththaigalaip Pesum Anniya Pennaagiya Parasthreekkum Thappuvikkappaduvaai.
18 avaludaiya Veedu Maranaththukkum, Avaludaiya Paadhaigal Mariththoridaththirkum Saaigiradhu.
19 avalidaththil Pogiravargalil Oruvarum Thirumbugiradhillai, Jeevapaadhaigalil Vandhu Serugiradhumillai.
20 aadhalaal Nee Nallavargalin Vazhiyile Nadandhu, Needhimaangalin Paadhaigalaik Kaaththukkolvaayaaga.
21 sevvaiyaanavargal Boomiyile Vaasampannuvaargal; Uththamargal Adhile Thangiyiruppaargal.
22 dhunmaarkkaro Boomiyilirundhu Aruppundupovaargal; Dhrogigal Adhil Iraadhapadikku Nirmoolamaavaargal.
